page.title: 09My Impression of Our Area
page.content: When I first came to Bethlehem just over a year ago I thought it was very quiet compared to the city of Cardiff where I used to live.My mother wanted to move here because she was born in a small village nearby called Llanwrda. In Bethlehem there are far more animals and wildlife,I see many birds of prey here such as the Red Kite,Owls and Buzzards.In the countryside there are wore woodlands of decidious and coniferous trees with large fields and hedges,It is a good place for keeping dogs.My home,Talar Wen has a small wood with many flowers growing on the woodland floor.Animals that I see regulory are squirrels, hedgehogs, various birds of prey, foxes and rabbits.
